name: The Local Cauldron
description:
Potion Seller! Manage your potions shop by serving customers as fast as possible! Use the arrow keys to navigate in front of a customer, then press x to serve them a potion. Once you're in the potion making game, use your bar-tending skills to serve exactly the requested amount of potion, and add the special ingredient corresponding to the color of the customer. 

This game is inspired by Ore no Ryomi, an excellent game by Chubigans.
